message.content:
cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.RO 

The paper deals with the formal design of Fault Detection and Identification (FDI) components for autonomous critical systems, which involves logical specification, validation, and verification. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, such as Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO), Software Engineering (cs.SE), Systems and Control (cs.SY), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Robotics (cs.RO). Among these, cs.LO is the most likely category, as the paper proposes a logical language for FDI specification and semantics based on temporal epistemic logic. The other categories are also relevant, as the paper discusses validation, verification, and synthesis of FDI components, which involve software engineering, control systems, artificial intelligence, and robotics.
